member.name: PARAMDATA
member.summary: Describes a parameter accepted by a method or property.

member.name: PARAMDATA.szName
member.summary: The parameter name. Names should follow standard conventions for programming language access; that is, no embedded spaces or control characters, and 32 or fewer characters. The name should be localized because each type description provides names for a particular locale.

member.name: PARAMDATA.vt
member.summary: The parameter type. If more than one parameter type is accepted, VT_VARIANT should be specified.
